entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Rain over eastern sections early this morning. Snowfall amount 4 cm over western sections. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High 12. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
